scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:Achievements_AchievementList_Name}
scriptedContentFragment.configuration: <propertyGroup id="options" resourceName="Options"> <property id="fragmentHeader" resourceName="CF_Title" dataType="string" defaultValue="" controlType="Telligent.Evolution.Controls.ContentFragmentTokenStringControl, Telligent.Evolution.Platform" /> <property id="queryType" resourceName="CF_AchievementList_QueryType" dataType="string" defaultValue=""> <propertyValue value="achievements" resourceName="CF_AchievementList_QueryType_Achievements" /> <propertyValue value="currentUser" resourceName="CF_AchievementList_QueryType_CurrentUser" /> <propertyValue value="accessingUser" resourceName="CF_AchievementList_QueryType_AccessingUser" /> </property> <property id="viewType" resourceName="Achievements_AchievementList_ViewType" dataType="string" defaultValue="standard"> <propertyValue value="list" resourceName="Achievements_AchievementList_ListView" /> <propertyValue value="thumbnails" resourceName="Achievements_AchievementList_ThumbnailView" /> </property> <property id="sortBy" resourceName="CF_SortBy" dataType="string" defaultValue="alphabetical"> <propertyValue value="alphabetical" resourceName="CF_AchievementList_QueryType_SortBy_Alphabetical" /> <propertyValue value="createddate" resourceName="CF_AchievementList_QueryType_SortBy_CreatedDate" /> </property> <property id="sortOrder" resourceName="CF_SortOrder" dataType="string" defaultValue="ascending"> <propertyValue value="ascending" resourceName="SortOrderDropDownList_Asc" /> <propertyValue value="descending" resourceName="SortOrderDropDownList_Desc" /> </property> <property id="pageSize" resourceName="Pagesize" dataType="int" defaultValue="10"> <propertyRule type="Telligent.Evolution.Controls.PropertyRules.MinMaxValueRule, Telligent.Evolution.Platform" minValue="1" maxValue="100" /> </property> <property id="enablePaging" resourceName="EnablePaging" dataType="bool" defaultValue="True" /> </propertyGroup>
scriptedContentFragment.languageResources: <language key="en-us"> <resource name="Achievements">Achievements</resource> <resource name="Achievements_AchievementList_Description">Displays a list of achievements.</resource> <resource name="Achievements_AchievementList_ListView">List</resource> <resource name="Achievements_AchievementList_Name">Achievement -
